services.title: Building Permit
services.description: Apply for comprehensive building permits including architectural, structural, and electrical permits.
requirements: Unified Application Form for Building Permit (properly filled out and notarized)
Required documents (1 original and 2 photocopies, collated in a folder color-coded by the month of application)
steps: Secure and fill out the required forms.
Prepare required attachments (1 original and 2 photocopies).
Submit completed documents to the Office of the Building Official (OBO) at Cebu City Hall.
Pay assessed fees at the City Treasurer's Office.
Processing and approval by technical personnel.
Claim your Building Permit at the OBO once notified.
stepDetails:
Get the necessary application forms either from the Office of the Building Official (OBO) or by downloading them online.

You need to fill out the following forms:

  • Unified Application Form for Building Permit
  • Architectural Permit
  • Civil/Structural Permit
  • Electrical Permit
  • Electronics Permit (for commercial buildings only)
  • Fencing Permit
  • Mechanical Permit
  • Plumbing Permit
  • Sanitary Permit

ðŸ’¡ Make sure all forms are properly filled out and signed by the owner and the respective licensed professionals (Architects, Engineers).

Proceed to the Office of the Building Official (OBO), Cebu City Hall, and submit your completed documents and forms.

Upon submission, kindly collate all requirements/documents into a folder with the following color code:

Ensure all documents are properly labeled and organized before submission.

Proceed to the Office of the Building Official (OBO), Cebu City Hall and submit your completed documents and forms.

The OBO staff will check for completeness and compliance.

If everything is in order, your documents will be forwarded for technical evaluation.
Once your application is assessed and approved, youâ€™ll be issued an Order of Payment. Pay the necessary building permit fees at the City Treasurerâ€™s Office located within Cebu City Hall.

After payment, your application will go through:

  • Evaluation and review by technical personnel (Architectural, Structural, Electrical, etc.)
  • Approval by the Building Official

This process may take several days or weeks depending on the complexity of your project.

Once approved, youâ€™ll be notified to claim your Building Permit at the OBO.

This document officially allows you to begin construction in accordance with your approved plans and specifications.

services.title: Business Permit
services.description: Obtain your Mayor's Permit for legal business operation in Cebu City.
requirements: DTI Certificate (for Sole Proprietorship) or SEC/CDA Registration
Contract of Lease (if renting) or Tax Clearance/Transfer Certificate of Title
Sanitary Permit from the City Health Department
Fire Safety Inspection Certificate (FSIC) from the BFP
steps: Secure application form from the Business Permit and Licensing Office (BPLO).
Submit initial requirements to BPLO.
Assessment and payment at the City Treasurer's Office.
Secure ancillary clearances from respective offices.
Final submission to BPLO for verification and permit issuance.

services.title: Barangay Clearance
services.description: Get certification of residency and good moral character from your local barangay.
steps: Visit your Barangay Hall during office hours.
Fill out the application form with purpose of clearance.
Submit documents: ID and proof of residency.
Verification by staff.
Pay the fee and keep the receipt.
Receive the signed Barangay Clearance.

services.title: Property Tax
services.description: Pay your annual Real Property Tax (RPT).
requirements: For first-time: copy of property title and tax declaration
steps: Determine amount due with City Treasurer's Office.
Assessment at Assessor Office.
Pay at City Treasurer's Office or authorized online channels.
Obtain official receipt.
Avail discounts for early full payment.

additionalInfo.title: Payment Schedule & Penalties
content: Full Payment Discount: On or before March 31 (up to 10% discount).
Quarterly Installments: Mar 31, Jun 30, Sep 30, Dec 31.
